Plintissa angruily answered Liono.

"The defenses are against me and I'm helping your group you nut! But I'll
come, I want to show you that I'm worthy of being a Maximal, even if you
don't answer challenges, I'll fight for you." Plintissa said. Plintissa was
shot at by a blaster and she grumbled and shot at it.

"Dumb things follow you everywhere!" Plintissa said, referring to the
blaster...
----- Original Message -----
From: <RgDaN@...>

Sent: Tuesday, June 13, 2000 12:15 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
